summary: Fic rec!
title: Fic rec!
body:
I’m going to try and be better at commenting, reccing, and generally spreading love for all the wonderful fandom content creators in 2019, so i’m getting an early start..

This fic was absolutely wonderful and oblivious!Harry with his sexuality crisis was beautiful. Mostly fluffy with slight angst (Click through for tags and warnings!)

Around You Moves by Ignatiustrout (~29k)

Harry/Draco | M | complete

Harry knew Draco was gay when he invited him to move in. He’s never had a problem with this. So why does he feel so weird about Draco bringing men home all of a sudden?

luna: he was just exposed to...
body:

summary:
The Marauders decide to start a business together.
James: You see what we can do when we work together? With my business...
body:
The Marauders decide to start a business together.

James: You see what we can do when we work together? With my business acumen…

Sirius: My innovative ideas

Remus: My scientific know-how

Peter nodding along and smiling: And I’m also here

summary:
Harry: I'll tell him I love him
Ron: Okay, go
Harry: What if he says he dones't love me back?
Ron: You cry yourself to sleep for...
body:
Harry: I'll tell him I love him
Ron: Okay, go
Harry: What if he says he dones't love me back?
Ron: You cry yourself to sleep for months and eat ice cream every day. That's what I did when Hermione refused to go out with me
Harry: She refused to go to the cinema with you
Ron: I can be as dramatic as I want!

summary: in japan when i was walking in the crowd someone suddenly made eye contact with me then grinned and pointed at my ravenclaw...
body:
in japan when i was walking in the crowd someone suddenly made eye contact with me then grinned and pointed at my ravenclaw scarf i was wearing then yelled ‘ravenclaw!’ and i fingergunned him back. we then went our separate ways.


this is why i love fandoms

th

summary: It's Over, Isn't It?
title: It's Over, Isn't It?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2ETrnb2

by xxLilyxx

A fic based on Severus Snape and Lily Evans and the song: It’s Over, isn’t it? - from Steven Universe.

Mostly portrayed in Snape’s POV.

Estimated to end up with 10k words.

summary:
Harry: Hey can I ask you something?
Draco: Okay 
Harry: If the toilets drain into the ocean, does that mean a tiny shark could...
body:
Harry: Hey can I ask you something?

Draco: Okay

Harry: If the toilets drain into the ocean, does that mean a tiny shark could swim up and bite me in the butt?

Draco: …No, not at all

Harry: Pfft, lame

tags: raven is going to kill puff one of these days
meanwhile Puff and Sly enjoyed some... privacy
summary:
Hufflepuff: It's about time
Hufflepuff: Hey, Raven! 
Ravenclaw: What is it? 
Hufflepuff: Are you free tonight? There's a new...
body:
Hufflepuff: It’s about time

Hufflepuff: Hey, Raven!

Ravenclaw: What is it?

Hufflepuff: Are you free tonight? There’s a new movie coming out and it seems really cool!

Ravenclaw: …I am so far, I guess we could go.

Hufflepuff: Yay!

Hufflepuff: Gryff, Gryff! What about you?

Gryffindor: Sure, I’m in.

Hufflepuff: Perfect! Well, then here you have the tickets! I’ve already plans with Sly so you two can enjoy it on your own.

Hufflepuff: Have fun, bye bye!

Gryffindor: …Okay?

Ravenclaw: *blushing a bit* PUFF.

title: Rupert Grint: „Harry Potter“ und der Kontrollverlust im Leben
excerpt: Rupert Grint hat als Ron Weasley in den „Harry Potter“-Filmen verzaubert. Für den 30-Jährigen brachte das extrem viel Ruhm und Geld. Aber auch das Leben an sich geriet durch die Rolle aus den Fugen. Grint [...] LooMee TV

summary: harry: i hate when i misplace my glasses because then im forced to walk around looking like im suspicious of everything in the...
body:
harry: i hate when i misplace my glasses because then im forced to walk around looking like im suspicious of everything in the room

draco: “whattabout you, cabinet? you sketchy piece of shit? did you take ‘em?”

harry: shuT UP
